name: Bat Bustle
description:
In this game, you enter the arcade world dodging ghosts in order to achieve a high score.

Controls:

W,A,S,D = Move

Design Team:

Leon Lowe

Features:

Challenging gameplay

Multiple difficulties

Retro feel

Reviews:

(Leave a review in the comments section for a chance for it to be featured here)

Donations are not required but are very appreciated. Every bit of money will help this studio grow and make better games.
